init_top

void init_top(int topt)

Initializes the topsystem by pointing tstep_top, pre_top
and post_top to the functions determined by toptype.

Values for topt in topsys.h


from: intopsys.c

from file: doc


prtopsys

void prtopsys(void)


Prints all topsystems descriptions on stderr


from: intopsys.c
